name: Settings
desc: A scene that presents an interface for viewing and modifying an app’s settings.

items.name: init(content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a scene that presents an interface for viewing and modifying an app’s preferences.

items.name: var body: some Scene
items.desc: The content and behavior of the scene.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of scene that represents the body of this scene.
